uk.ac.uea.mathsthing

Class Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.mathsthing.Functions

  • public final class Functions
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to handle mathematical functions in a provided formula.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jordan Woerner

      A String containing a Regex pattern of all supported functions.

    • Field Detail

      • SUPPORTED_FUNCTIONS

        public static final java.lang.String[] SUPPORTED_FUNCTIONS
        A collection of the functions the class currently understands.
        Since:
        1.0

      • functionRegex

        public static final java.lang.String functionRegex
        A String containing a Regex pattern of all supported functions. Allows for known functions to be captured by Matcher.
        Since:
        1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Functions

        public Functions()

    • Method Detail

      • isSupported

        public static final boolean isSupported(java.lang.String funcName)
                                 throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        Checks to see if the specified function is supported before it is processed.
        Parameters:
        funcName - The function name as a String.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the function is supported, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - Thrown if an empty or null function name is passed.
        Since:
        1.0

      • processFunction

        public static final java.math.BigDecimal processFunction(java.lang.String funcName,
                                                         java.math.BigDecimal result)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Processes a provided function and returns the output from the function. If the parameter is a formula itself rather than a constant or number it will be calculated before it is used.
        Parameters:
        funcName - The name of the function to call as a String.
        result - The result from the evaluation tree to process.
        Returns:
        Returns a double containing the result of the function.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if there is an error evaluating the formula this function works on.
        Since:
        1.0

      • fact

        public static final double fact(int n)
        Calculates factorial numbers. Can only be used for numbers that would return a result that fits within a double. A minor limit, but it should be more than enough for our needs.
        Parameters:
        n - The number to compute the factorial of as an integer.
        Returns:
        The computed factorial as a double.
        Since:
        1.0
